name: Custom Adult Item Example
author: BUDDYWORKS
description:
Custom Items that are not related to booth assets can be defined using the custom item descriptor system.
You can find this example inside the demo folder under BoothDownloaderOut/wtf.buddyworks.example.
Custom items are defined with their own json format and behave similiarly to other items.
Relations to other items must be manually defined by ID.
https://github.com/JustBuddy/BoothDownloader-web
